Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its unique features and high quality, I am offering it to you at a special price of $20000. This is an opportunity to secure a piece that not only meets but exceeds expectations in terms of craftsmanship and utility. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
